text: @parscale @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Thats a shame the Republicans are trying to make money on the covid-19 out break. Trump should be a shame of himself. First he says he can live with the fact that over 85000 Americans died and now he is cashing in on it. I’m not surprised are you. 😢
